title: Let’s Do Our Best and Have Fun!
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>I can’t wait for the next live~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I’ll definitely come to the next μ’s one!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Hm? Doesn’t Aqours also have one coming up?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Nijigaku will have its regular lives soon too, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Everyone's lives are so close together!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>So that means...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>We’ll get to enjoy a whole bunch of them!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>You’re right~! Let’s all do our best!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Yeah! Thinking about how if we each work hard, everyone gets to enjoy our lives more, makes me even more motivated!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Let’s give it our all and enjoy it to the fullest!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
